title: Two problems
body: I have noticed that every time i finish a game it takes a long time just to load the stats instead of a couple seconds. Also i have one worlds mission and it says to complete 4 missions and i only have one done and no other missions. Not sure if it is glitched or not.

replies.body:
On that first issue, check the client options for something called "close client during game" and make sure that is **NOT** checked. That should make the post game show up a bit faster for ya.

As for the World's missions, you do need to have the icon equipped in order to get mission progress. It looks like you only had the icon equipped while completing one of the missions.
